title: Publish comprehensive 10-year findings in major journal
description: Publish comprehensive 10-year findings in major journal
content:
Scenario: Publish comprehensive 10-year findings in major journal
    Given James has completed decade-long study
    When he prepares comprehensive research report
    Then he documents methodology with full transparency
    And he presents both positive findings and disappointments
    And he acknowledges uncertainties and limitations
    And he makes full dataset available for replication
    And he publishes open access in multiple formats
    And he contributes definitive evidence about democratic AI governance at scale
